item.description: Hey guys! Let's treat our pups to a special day where it's all about them! February has 2 FUN Holidays to celebrate the ones we Love to Love...Valentine's Day & Love Your Pet Day! Whethere we shower them with Smooches at the Pooches Kissing Booth or watch them play "Cupid Says" or Red Rover I know there will be plenty of FUN TIMES afoot! Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies DHLPP Bordatella
item.name: Love is in the Air at Best Friends Pet Care!
